main event: An observer reported a sighting of a bright self-luminous orange-red object in the sky over Perth Amboy, New Jersey, on December 1, 1967.
interesting points: The observer described the object as bright and solid with fuzzy edges., The object appeared to move towards the observer, disappearing behind a church steeple before coming out and moving faster., The sighting lasted for about 30 to 50 seconds., A diagram was sketched by the observer showing the object's path., The report was part of Project Blue Book's investigation into UFO sightings.
witness description: Members of an astronomy club observing the object from the roof of the local YMCA.
